name: Nifty League
introduce: Nifty League is bringing competitive gaming to Web3 - moving away from play-to-earn (P2E) into a new era of play-and-earn (P&E) by offering a fun and engaging gaming ecosystem. The Niftyverse, an online world for Nifty League gamers, is centered around nostalgia where builders, players, and owners spend time connecting, gaming, and earning in Web3.
